sentences.en: Hamlet and Laertes were known to excel at this sword play.
sentences.cn: 哈姆莱特和雷欧提斯两个人都精通剑术.

sentences.en: Hamlet had gone too far to leave off here.
sentences.cn: 哈姆莱特说得太露骨,收不住了.

sentences.en: Hamlet is one of Shakespeare's best known tragedies.
sentences.cn: 《哈姆雷特》是莎士比亚最著名的悲剧之一.

sentences.en: Hamlet is required reading ( ie must be read ) for the course.
sentences.cn: 《哈姆雷特》为本课程指定读物.

sentences.en: Hamlet was played by Romania's leading actor, Ion Caramitrou, to rapturous acclaim.
sentences.cn: 哈姆雷特由罗马尼亚的一流演员伊恩·克拉米宙来饰演, 以引起轰动.

sentences.en: He has acted the part of Hamlet three times.
sentences.cn: 他已演过三次哈姆雷特这个角色.

sentences.en: He played the title role in'Hamlet '.
sentences.cn: 他在《哈姆雷特》中演哈姆雷特的角色.

sentences.en: He was cast as [ for the part of ] Hamlet.
sentences.cn: 选派 他扮演哈姆雷特的角色.

sentences.en: It was easy to believe that the tiny hamlet held some great mystery.
sentences.cn: 很容易让人相信这个小村庄藏着重大谜团.

sentences.en: Olivier , in the film, makes Hamlet a figure of tragic indecision.
sentences.cn: 在该影片中, 奥立维尔把哈姆雷特演成了优柔寡断的悲剧人物.

sentences.en: Shakespeare's Hamlet is one of the best known tragedies.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚的《哈姆雷特》是最有名的悲剧之一.

sentences.en: The hamlet had been burned to the ground.
sentences.cn: 这座村落已完全被烧光了.

sentences.en: The part of Hamlet was played by Laurence Olivier.
sentences.cn: 哈姆莱特一角是由劳伦斯·奥立弗扮演的.

sentences.en: They are going to put on Hamlet.
They descended the slope towards the hamlet.
sentences.cn: 他们顺坡下山,向那个村子走去.

trans.tran_cn: 村子，〈英〉（无教堂的）小村庄，〈比喻〉优柔寡断的人，哈姆雷特
